dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, have you seen the news about Saudi Arabia hosting the UNESCO World Heritage Committee session?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, have you seen the news about Saudi Arabia hosting the U N E S C O World Heritage Committee session?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I saw something about it! I mean, it sounded like a *massive* event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I saw something about it! I mean, it sounded like a massive event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Massive is an understatement, honestly. [overlaps] They welcomed over 3,000 delegates to Riyadh!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Massive is an understatement, honestly. They welcomed over three thousand delegates to Riyadh!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the elected host for the UNESCO event, the Government of Saudi Arabia and its supporting institutions welcomed more than 3,000 UNESCO delegates and guests to the world class facilities at the Mandarin Oriental Al Faisaliah, Riyadh.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Wow, 3,000? That's... that's a huge undertaking. And in Riyadh, too. I feel like Riyadh is really stepping up its game as a global hub.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, three thousand? That's... that's a huge undertaking. And in Riyadh, too. I feel like Riyadh is really stepping up its game as a global hub.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. I mean, it's home to a young, diverse population, like, nearly 8 million. Plus, it's a major regional business center now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. I mean, it's home to a young, diverse population, like, nearly eight million. Plus, it's a major regional business center now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Home to a young and diverse population of nearly 8 million, the ninth largest stock market in the world, and a regional hub for international businesses, Riyadh is increasingly seen as a destination of choice for large-scale, high profile global events.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, it's not just, um, oil anymore, is it? They're really showcasing their culture, too. I remember the Saudi Minister of Culture talking about sharing their heritage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, it's not just, um, oil anymore, is it? They're really showcasing their culture, too. I remember the Saudi Minister of Culture talking about sharing their heritage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His Highness Prince Bader bin Abdullah bin Mohammed bin Farhan Al Saud, Saudi Minister of Culture and Chairman of the Saudi National Commission For Education, Culture and Science said: We are delighted to welcome the UNESCO World Heritage Committee members, and the 195 attendees from the member states where we have had the opportunity to share the richness of Saudi culture, hospitality, and heritage with the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Prince Bader bin Abdullah said they were "delighted to share the richness of Saudi culture, hospitality, and heritage with the world."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Prince Bader bin Abdullah said they were "delighted to share the richness of Saudi culture, hospitality, and heritage with the world."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His Highness Prince Bader bin Abdullah bin Mohammed bin Farhan Al Saud, Saudi Minister of Culture and Chairman of the Saudi National Commission For Education, Culture and Science said: We are delighted to welcome the UNESCO World Heritage Committee members, and the 195 attendees from the member states where we have had the opportunity to share the richness of Saudi culture, hospitality, and heritage with the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And UNESCO's Director-General, Audrey Azoulay, she echoed that, didn't she? Like, emphasizing Saudi Arabia's investment in culture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And U N E S C O's Director-General, Audrey Azoulay, she echoed that, didn't she? Like, emphasizing Saudi Arabia's investment in culture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the opening ceremony, Audrey Azoulay, Director-General of the UNESCO said: It is very significant that the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is hosting such a universal session, with so many participants, diverse voices, and intense debates. It is further proof that Saudi Arabia situated at one of the crossroads of the world with its rich, multi-millennial history has chosen to invest in culture, heritage and creativity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, she called it "further proof" of their commitment. [pauses] But beyond the cultural exchange, the *logistics* of this thing, B, were insane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, she called it "further proof" of their commitment. But beyond the cultural exchange, the logistics of this thing, B, were insane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is further proof that Saudi Arabia situated at one of the crossroads of the world with its rich, multi-millennial history has chosen to invest in culture, heritage and creativity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's what I was thinking! Like, managing that many people and that many events...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what I was thinking! Like, managing that many people and that many events...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They had a 4,450 square meter main conference venue, column-free, for 4,000 people! And over 37 side events.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They had a four thousand, four hundred fifty square meter main conference venue, column-free, for four thousand people! And over thirty seven side events.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Some of the key highlights from the UNESCO event include: 4,450m2 main conference venue with a capacity for 4000 attendees the largest column-free venue in the Kingdom; ... Over 37 side events and exhibitions over the two weeks;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wow. And I heard about, like, all the support they had?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow. And I heard about, like, all the support they had?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah. Over 30 concierges, 60 transportation contacts, [overlaps] 60 buses providing shuttles...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah. Over thirty concierges, sixty transportation contacts, sixty buses providing shuttles...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 30 points of contact, 30 concierge, 60 transportation contacts, 25 booths and 50 hosting teams; Fleet of 60 buses providing free shuttle bus services between the venue, recommended hotels, and the airport;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Instant visas too, right? For 3,000 officials. That's, uh, pretty incredible coordination.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Instant visas too, right? For three thousand officials. That's, uh, pretty incredible coordination.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The issuance of over 3,000 visas for UNESCO officials and guests from the 195 member states including instant pre-arrival and on-arrival issuance;

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It really highlights their Vision 2030 plan, you know, for cultural transformation and economic diversity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It really highlights their Vision twenty thirty plan, you know, for cultural transformation and economic diversity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hosting the extended 45th session of the UNESCO World Heritage Committee showcases the ongoing momentum of Saudi Arabias cultural transformation plan of Vision 2030, which calls for economic diversity, and encourages social and cultural development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's clear they're serious about becoming a major player for, like, these high-profile global events.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's clear they're serious about becoming a major player for, like, these high-profile global events.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It was a huge statement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It was a huge statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A very impressive one, at that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A very impressive one, at that.
